name: Geometry Morph
description:
A physics-based platformer where you morph between different types of objects, each having their own unique physical properties. This game was made by team Silver Surfers at Chillenium 2018, for the theme "Transformation."

How to run:

1. Download the game.

2. Unzip the game using 7zip.

3. Run the executable named ""!

How to play:

* WASD or arrow keys to move.

* Hold SPACEBAR to prepare to jump, then release to perform the jump. The longer you hold the SPACEBAR, the higher you will jump, up to a certain threshold. Jumping is performed by the Spring.

* ALPHA 1 (the "1" key at the top left of your keyboard) to change into the Weighted Cube.

* ALPHA 2 (the "2" key at the top left of your keyboard) to change into the Bouncy Ball.

* ALPHA 3 (the "3" key at the top left of your keyboard) to change into the Paper Airplane.
